mapper.insert: insert into matewrite(no, pno, userid, area, matePic1, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')writedate, enddate, matestate, mateProfile) values (housematesq.nextval, #{pno}, #{userid}, #{area}, #{matePic1}, #{deposit}, #{rent}, #{enterdate}, #{minStay}, #{maxStay}, sysdate, sysdate+7, '모집중', #{mateProfile} )
mapper.update: update matewrite set matePic1=#{matePic1}, deposit=#{deposit}, rent=#{rent}, enterdate=#{enterdate}, minStay=#{minStay}, maxStay=#{maxStay}, mateProfile=#{mateProfile} where userid=#{userid} and pno=#{pno}
mapper.select: select no, pno, userid, area, matePic1, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, writedate, enddate, matestate, mateProfile from matewrite where userid=#{param1}
select matePic1 from matewrite where userid=#{param1} and no=#{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from matewrite where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT mw.NO, mw.pno, mw.userid, mw.area, mw.matepic1, mw.matepic2, mw.matepic3, mw.deposit, mw.rent, mw.enterdate, mw.minstay, mw.maxstay, mw.writedate, mw.enddate, mw.matestate, mw.mateprofile, g.gender, g.m_gender, g.h_noise, g.h_pattern, g.h_pet, g.h_petwith, g.h_smoke, g.h_mood, g.h_communication, g.h_party, g.h_enter, g.m_pattern, g.m_personality, g.m_pet, g.m_smoke, g.m_age, g.m_global, g.m_now, g.pdate FROM (SELECT * FROM MATEWRITE WHERE matestate='모집중'
AND area LIKE '%${param1}%' ) mw JOIN (SELECT p.userid, m.gender, p.m_gender, p.h_noise, p.h_pattern, p.h_pet, p.h_petwith, p.h_smoke, p.h_mood, p.h_communication, p.h_party, p.h_enter, p.m_pattern, p.m_personality, p.m_pet, p.m_smoke, p.m_age, p.m_global, p.m_now, p.pdate FROM (SELECT userid, gender FROM MEMBER) m JOIN (SELECT userid, m_gender, h_noise, h_pattern, h_pet, h_petwith, h_smoke, h_mood, h_communication, h_party, h_enter, m_pattern, m_personality, m_pet, m_smoke, m_age, m_global, m_now, substr(to_char(pdate, 'YYYY'),1,1) AS pdate FROM PROPENSITY WHERE pcase='m') p ON m.userid=p.userid) g ON mw.userid=g.userid ORDER BY writedate DESC) where rownum<= 9
select no, pno, userid, area, matePic1, matePic2, matePic3, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, writedate, enddate, matestate, mateProfile from matewrite where no=#{param1}
